happy: A vibrant, colorful digital painting in the style of a joyful festival, confetti, and sunshine
sad: A moody watercolor painting of a rainy day, soft blue tones, gentle brushstrokes
angry: A bold, expressive abstract painting with red and black splashes, dynamic brushwork
surprised: A pop-art style illustration with bright, comic book colors and dramatic lines
neutral: A calm, minimalist landscape in soft pastel colors, serene and peaceful
fearful: A surreal, misty forest scene with mysterious lighting, cinematic atmosphere
disgusted: A cubist painting with distorted shapes and greenish hues, Picasso-inspired
